name: ClawieTalkie
description: Walkie-talkie voice interface â€” relays audio between the ClawieTalkie app and your OpenClaw agent.

secretKey.description: Secret key for ClawieTalkie app authentication (Bearer token). Auto-generated on first run if empty.

voicePrompt.description: System prompt prepended to transcribed speech before sending to the agent. Controls response style (length, format, etc.).

agentName.description: Display name shown on the device when a voice message arrives (e.g. in the iOS PTT UI). Defaults to 'main'.

stt.description: Speech-to-text provider config. If not set, falls back to env vars (ELEVENLABS_API_KEY, OPENAI_API_KEY, etc.).

provider.description: Provider name: elevenlabs, openai, groq, or deepgram.

apiKey.description: API key for the STT provider.

baseUrl.description: Base URL override (e.g. for custom routers). Uses provider default if omitted.

model.description: Model override. Uses provider default if omitted.

voicePrompt.label: Voice Prompt
voicePrompt.placeholder: You MUST reply in ONE short sentence...
